species.name: Twi'lek
species.description: Twi-leks possess two prehensile tentacles, their tchun-tchin, or lekku, that project from the back of hteir heads. These "head-tails" serve as a second tongue by which they can communicate through signs and gestures. The rainbow of flesh tones found among the Twi'leks are indicators of clan and region of ancestry.
species.startSkills: Begin game with 1 rank in either Charm or Deception.
species.specialAbilities: May remove 1 Setback imposed due to arid or hot environmental conditions.
